name: Out of the Frost and into the Fire
name_original: Out of the Frost and into the Fire
description:
Created for the Unreal Spring jam 2020

Out of the Frost and into the Fire

One man team game. By William Ruhlig.

(i streamed most of it on twitch.tv/photonwind)

New horizons await! Penguin colonists have discovered a potent new fuel on a dangerous planet. Fire and Ice contrast on a planet with burning hot days and freezing nights

Collect fuel to build terraforming stations which protect you from harsh conditions but cost fuel to maintain.

stay on the shadow rim to survive as long as posible

WASD or Arrow keys. Left click to use flamethrower on ice

E to build a building, 10 fuel cost.

Flamethrower usage costs 1 per Ice.

Fuel A building by clicking on it when nearby.

Awesome music butchered by desyncs are my fault not the music creators! (Luke Darlow and William Berg)

#unrealjam
